@computer-user Thanks for all the December downloads. Mad skills.

One question. I've been able to install, register, and use Driver Genius on two machines before installing on a 3rd. On the 3rd machine, it keeps asking me to register when I want to fix my drivers. It accepts the key I had already put in before updating every time it asks me, but won't "fix" my drivers and still asks for Registration? Any idea why?

(The other two machines I used the key first, then did a scan, fix, etc. The 3rd machine I used the key, did an update because my "database" was more than 15 days old or something, scan, fix, register, scan, fix, register, etc.) 

Thanks again for all the work and uploads!
Interesting to see what W7's SP1 will bring.
